column3:
“Big fan!!! 👍🏻🍋👌🏻
When life gives you Super Sour Lemon smoke it.”
“one of my favorite weeds cause it's not harsh, don't leave a harsh after taste, have a good smell as well as tough buds.”

“Super Sour Lemon is making its way to the top of my most favored list! I have Multiple Sclerosis, and because of that I have some very interesting nerve related tingling and itching issues. Since starting SSL there have actually been days where the facial head and neck nerve issues have been completely unnoticeable for quite some time! This the FIRST time in YEARS the nerve issues have been reduced like this! This is...”
